meaningMnemonic:
A <radical>wolverine</radical> is going down a <radical>slide</radical> into your <radical>mouth</radical>. Why is he going into your mouth, though? You're opening it really wide, because you're screaming "<kanji>BUDDY</kanji>"!!! You're so excited to see your wolverine buddy-pal again. 

But this wolverine isn’t just your buddy, he’s also the local <kanji>ruler</kanji> of these lands. You make it a habit to befriend the local strongmen, so no wonder even the rulers are your buddies.
readingMnemonic: As you're about to embrace your <kanji>buddy</kanji> wolverine, a rac<reading>coon</reading> (くん) tackles the wolverine off the slide, preventing your mouth embrace.
